title: Gettysburg National Military Park: Park Newspaper
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Park Newspaper               Park Newspaper         (Miller's History)  The Gettysburg Quarterly park newspaper has been discontinued. Park news is now posted on the blog, "From the Fields of Gettysburg" and on the park's Facebook page. These internet based outlets are helping the park reduce its carbon footprint. For past issues of the Gettysburg Quarterly, visit the Park Newspaper Archives.
